toasts.jscodedocumentation 

var toasts = new Toasts({
	fadeDuration:200,
	cssWay:{
		elementClass:'toast',
		fadeInClass:'risingToast',
		fadeOutClass:'fadingToast'
	}
})

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', ()=>{
	function getel(name){ return document.getElementById(name) }
	
	getel('sayHello').addEventListener('click', ()=>{
		toasts.post('Welcome, friend.')
	})
	getel('warning').addEventListener('click', ()=>{
		toasts.post(
			"Look out! Something is happening! Things are changing!",
			{lifespan:Infinity, color:'rgba(235,130,0, 0.7)'}
		)
	})
	getel('hotTake').addEventListener('click', ()=>{
		toasts.post("The emperor knows he is naked and is only pretending not to!")
	})
})
